Class StaticChecker<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>>

java.lang.Object
net.tangly.fsm.utilities.StaticChecker<O,S,E>
Type Parameters:
O - the class of the instance owning the finite state machine instance
S - the state enumeration type uniquely identifying a state in the state machine
E - the event enumeration type uniquely identifying the event sent to the state machine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Checker
public class StaticChecker<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>> extends Object implements Checker
The finite state machine static checker verifies the correctness of a state machine description. The following rules are verified.
  • Each enumeration value is used exactly once in the state machine description.
  • A state has at most one initial substate.
  • Each composite state with a transition ending on it has an initial state.
  • The state machine has a clear set of initial states so that it can be initialized properly.
  • A final state has no outgoing transition.
